PerfectNetExp.abs: 短长短格(amphibrach)[转载]音步短长长短格(antispast),  短长长格(bacchius),  长短短格(choriambus),  长短长格(cretic),  短长长短长格(dochmiac).
5. 抑扬抑格(Amphibrach):每个音步由一个非重读音节加一个重读音节再加一个非重读音节构成。如:三音步抑扬抑格)-)/)-)/)-)下例中最后一个音步为抑扬格。.
n. 强弱弱格,长短短路 dactyl n. 抑扬抑格,短长短路 amphibrach分解解释:短 (duǎn,)短 duǎn 长度小,与“长(ch俷g )”相对:短期。短暂。短促。短途。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally in the Latin forms amphibrachus, amphibrachys): via Latin from Greek amphibrakhus 'short at both ends'

means.word_mean: 1. a metrical unit with unstressed-stressed-unstressed syllables (e.g., `remember')
